column4: hi, initially i didnt have swap partition.. so i went back to windows and resized my ubuntu partition to 2 parts...one for the current ubuntu...and the other for the linux swap partition.. how do i configure the ubuntu to recognize the swap partition now...thanks
yeah..i am in ubuntu envrionement now
: but i cant see the swap partition....or where to find it...
do a sudo fdisk -l .. find out the partition name which is swap.
yeah i have typed the swapon command ordi
yeah i have run /proc/meminfo cmd... i see a list of values...does this mean my swap is config
add it to ur boot in /etc/fstab
oh the next time , i restart the swap partition will automatically configured rite...
